title: Maps, Artifacts, and other Arcane Magic
description: One treasure down, two to go …	Three months ago, I nearly lost my best friend while retrieving the first instrument of assassination. I also inadvertently released a rival who was definitely unhinged, way more powerful than me, and obsessed with harnessing the deadly power of the artifacts I’d been tasked by the guardian dragons to collect.	Add a sexy sentinel and a nearly immortal vampire to the mix, and what could possibly go wrong?	Knowing my luck, I was about to find out.
author: Meghan Ciana Doidge
